quote.summary: Zero2ipo Holdings Inc is an investment holding company principally engaged in providing integrated equity investment service. The Company operates its businesses through four segments. The Data Services segment enables access to industry data and facilitates informed decision-making through PEdata Database and research report services. The Marketing Services segment offers omni-channel marketing services through online information platforms and offline industry events. The Investment Banking Services segment provides advisory services in private placements and mergers and acquisitions, and securities sponsorship and underwriting services, also offer trading, investment consulting and asset management services. The Training services segment offers equity investment-related online and offline training courses primarily through online SandHill College, Zero2IPO SandHill College and Zero2IPO Investment Research Institute. The Company mainly operates its businesses in the domestic market.
